definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: You have just well confessed yourself that you do not believe in the rumors of sodomy.
sentences.chinese: 你刚才已经自己充分承认你不相信男色的传言。

sentences.english: Are you willing to give up to let my male color show other women?
sentences.chinese: 你舍得让我的男色让其他女人看到吗？

definition: (of greed, lust etc) to dominate one's thoughts
homosexual/see 斷袖之癖|断袖之癖[duan4 xiu4 zhi1 pi3]

lit. cut sleeve (idiom); fig. euphemism for homosexuality, originating from History of Western Han 漢書|汉书: emperor Han Aidi (real name Liu Xin) was in bed with his lover Dong Xian, and had to attend a court audience that morning. Not wishing to awaken Dong Xian, who was sleeping with his head resting on the emperor's long robe sleeve, Aidi used a knife to cut off the lower half of his sleeve.
lit. spirit and soul upside down (idiom); infatuated and head over heels in love/fascinated/captivated
